TopicTitle: Science tree doesnt update on clicking

Articles.Content: As title, got currently available mods at time of writing however the tech tree doesnt update when you press it - you have to leave, go to main screen and back before the changes take affect?

Please follow the advice in the sticky thread at the top of this sub-forum that explains how to report problems in a useful manner (especially the bits about the output_log.txt/player.log file and the list of mods).
